assignments.description: For ProServ Advisory, A&E, CND, DS&E {!sovApproval.Legal_Approver__c} needs to be equal Sophia Nguyen {!sovApproval.Ops_Approver__c} needs to be equal Finance user Jonny Lee BU Approver = Peter Fitzgibbon
assignments.name: ProServ_Approval_Defaults
assignments.label: ProServ Approval Defaults

assignments.description: For ProServ all sub practices with Fully Partner Delivered = yes {!sovApproval.Legal_Approver__c} needs to be equal Sophia Nguyen {!sovApproval.Ops_Approver__c} needs to be equal Finance user Karthik Gurumurthy BU Approver = Andy Buist Tech Approver
assignments.name: ProServ_Approval_Defaults_0
assignments.label: ProServ Approval Defaults (Fully Partner Delivered)

assignments.description: For ProServ ERP, ERP-MSP, Productivity MSFT, Digital No Finance and Legal Approvers, these will autocomplete after BU approval.
assignments.name: ProServ_Approval_Defaults_No_Finance_or_Legal
assignments.label: ProServ Approval Defaults (No Finance or Legal)

choices.name: ChangeOrder
choices.choiceText: Change Order

choices.description: Pre-Sales SA not part of opp team
choices.name: ChoiceNA

rules.name: Approver_Not_Null_EE_or_MCO
rules.label: Approver Not Null - EE or MCO

rules.name: Approver_Not_Null_ProServ
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 8 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 9)
rules.label: Approver Not Null - ProServ

rules.name: Approver_Not_Null_PS_No_Finance_or_Legal
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 4 AND (3 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Approver Not Null - PS (No Finance or Legal)

rules.name: Finance_and_Legal_Required
rules.conditionLogic: 7 OR (5 AND (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 6 OR 8))
rules.label: Finance and Legal Required

rules.name: No_Finance_and_Legal_Step_Required
rules.label: No Finance and Legal Step Required

decisions.description: Contracting will not need to be in the criteria.
decisions.name: Opp_Stage
decisions.label: Opp Stage

rules.name: Submitter_is_part_of_Opp_Team
rules.label: Pre-Sales SA or CSA is part of Opp Team?

rules.name: Submitter_Not_Available
rules.label: Pre-Sales SA Or CSA Not Available

Flow.description: Opps for Productivity and ERP should go through Tech and BU approval, then go to Docusign process. Reverting back to no finance or legal required.

dynamicChoiceSets.name: OppTeamMembersSA
dynamicChoiceSets.filterLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8)

formulas.description: Needs to be updated to Peter Fitzgibbon Id for all practices except 'Productivity MSFT'
formulas.name: buApprover
formulas.expression: IF(AND (ISPICKVAL({!sovOpp.Onica_BU_Practice__c} ,"Productivity MSFT" ), TEXT({!sovOpp.Type}) = "Professional Services"), "00561000001zt2gAAA", IF(AND (ISPICKVAL({!sovOpp.Onica_BU_Practice__c} ,"Delivery Lead Growth (GTS)" ), TEXT({!sovOpp.Type}) = "Professional Services"), "00561000003Ck7K", "0053f000000pG2CAAU"))

Flow.label: Submit for Approval

fields.name: HelpTEXT
fields.fieldText: Click on Next after uploading the document

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
There was an error getting the Id for the Approving Practice Manager. Please let your admin know that an error occurred and the following information:

Approving Practice Manager: {!sovOpp.Onica_Practice_Lead__c}

fields.name: NotRequiredType
fields.fieldText: Please review: Opportunity Type is incorrect or Onica Type is null.

fields.name: NoBillingCountryorState
fields.fieldText: Billing Country, Billing State or Primary Country are blank within the Account - please populate before proceeding.

fields.name: ApproverSubmitterNA
fields.fieldText: Please add missing Pre-Sales SA or CSA member to the Opportunity Team. Close this screen then restart approval.

fields.name: No
fields.fieldText: The Document needs to be uploaded.﻿

fields.name: NotContracting
fields.fieldText: Your Opportunity Stage must be Contracting or above in order to submit this for Legal Approval.

fields.name: RequiredFieldsAreMissing
fields.fieldText: Required Fields are missing. Please ensure all fields are filled out before submitting for Approval.

fields.name: RequiredFieldsAreMissingMCOEE
fields.fieldText: Required Fields are missing. Please ensure all fields are filled out before submitting for Approval.

screens.description: Pre-Sales SA must be part of the opp team
screens.name: Submitter_Check_Screen
screens.label: Pre-Sales SA / CSA Check Screen

fields.name: Who_is_the_current_submitter
fields.fieldText: Who is the Pre-Sales SA or CSA ?

fields.name: YesFile
fields.fieldText: The Document has been uploaded.

fields.name: clickOnNext
fields.fieldText: Click on Next

variables.description: captures CSA id from select screen
variables.name: varCSAId
